content.en: Trust-based MANET security: Researchers have been exploring ways to enhance the security and reliability of mobile ad hoc networks (MANETs) using trust-based algorithms. These algorithms evaluate and establish trust among nodes to prevent flooding attacks, improve routing reliability, construct routes without malicious nodes, strengthen cluster heads, mitigate malicious attacks, and improve network performance. By incorporating trust evaluation and management, these algorithms aim to enhance the overall security and performance of MANETs.
content.da: Tillidsbaseret MANET-sikkerhed: Forskere har udforsket måder til at forbedre sikkerheden og pålideligheden af mobile ad hoc-netværk (MANETs) ved hjælp af tillidsbaserede algoritmer. Disse algoritmer evaluerer og etablerer tillid blandt noder for at forhindre flooding-angreb, forbedre routing-pålidelighed, konstruere ruter uden ondsindede noder, styrke clusterhovedernes stabilitet, mitigere ondsindede angreb og forbedre netværkets ydeevne. Ved at inkorporere tillidsevaluering og -styring sigter disse algoritmer mod at forbedre den samlede sikkerhed og ydeevne af MANETs.
